About Me

Have some knowledge:

BIO

Full-stack capable web developer with a slight preference towards working with front-end technologies and packages such as basic HTML, Javascript, Sass, and Bootstrap. I possess a passion for React, although I am fluent in databases such as MySQL and MongoDB as well as their extensions, Sequelize and Mongoose. I enjoy creating detail-oriented innovative solutions to problems and working methodically to achieve preconceived goals.

The 24-week UT Coding boot camp from which I received my certification and 10 years of live performances have given me extreme familiarity with solving complicated problems while withstanding great amounts of stress, completing tasks by required deadlines and efficient time management, and left me no stranger to cohesive teamwork. I am eagerly searching for any opportunity allowing me to expand my knowledge through any languages and to aid whichever team I join with all of the skills I have to offer.

I look forward to hearing from you.

The Melting Pot

Bartender/Server

  • Maintained company standards to ensure that every guest received a “Perfect Night Out.”
  • Provided positive conversations and immaculately crafted cocktails for bar guests, following company specifications exactly.
  • Performed entertaining table-side food preparation and delivered cooking and safety instructions, also adhering to strict company policy.
  • Maintained spotless work environment to promote maximum eficiency in my workplace.

Music City Drum and Bugle Corps

Visual Technician

  • Responsible for the mental and physical health of a group of 150 people living on the road with an extremely hectic lifestyle.
  • Created choreography for the end product, bringing creative and innovative solutions to complex problems.
  • Instructed students in movement technique, spacial awareness, but above all else, individual responsibility and accountability.

The Village School

Low Brass Instructor

  • Provided instruction in low brass to a wide agerange of students, requiring modified approaches for each individual.
  • Tailored lesson plans to students’ specific needs, as well as creating schedules with defined, reasonable goals for them to achieve.
  • Responsible for creating my own schedule to maximize student success
  • Maintained a professional and inspirational learning environment to ensure maximum progress.
